text: Pleione forrestii is a species of flowering plant in the orchid family, Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Yunnan in China.Rankou, H., Averyanov, L. & Svengsuksa, B. 2015. Paphiopedilum dianthum. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2015. Downloaded on 13 September 2015.Pleione forrestii. Flora of China. It was named in honour of George Forrest (1873-1932). == Sources == == External links == * * forrestii Category:Endangered plants Category:Orchids of Yunnan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pleione forrestii
